reviewText: Was Looking for "Escape from Alcatraz" on DVD but was shocked with the prices for just the one movie.  Found this one with two other movies for a reasonable price.  Gave it to my Dad for Christmas and he was very pleased with all three movies. Good deal.

There are 2 (possibly 3) very good movies here. For me,Escape from Alcatraz and
Death Wish are the 2. One wonders,though,just how the choice was made to
put these 3 in the same package-availability? action? The pricing is quite
attractive.

I really wanted ONLY the video...'Uncommon Valor', but with this 'triple feature' being VERY close to just the purchase of only one(1) DVD, I purchased THIS item.
  I watched this movie on the Dish Network & comparing the two----the DVD is NOT all chopped-up to squeeze-it into it's 'alloted-time'.
  'Uncommon Valor' is a SUPER post-VietNam movie.
  Also....U can't beat the 'Death Wish' series either!!
DVDS In Excellent Shape.  Very Fast Delivery. Awesome Seller.  Will Buy From Again.

As expected, these discs are just a repackaging of the currently released discs. As such the transfers are still just so so and Escape from Alcatraz is non-anamorphic widescreen (that's always a disappointment). These films deserve far better treatment a far as a proper disc release is concerned, but if you're a fan of the movies and don't want to wait for the next re-release of the films then it's a good buy.

Excellent! If you are looking for 3 good action/drama movies on DVD, then here is your chance! Pictures are decent for DVD, with a nicely done package. Loved all three and found them for a good price! Bronson, Eastwood, Hackman!
Plays great, came on time. Glad I ordered it!
AS GOOD OR BETTER THAN EXPECTED
All three movies for one low price. Very happy with my purchase.

Excellent 3-disc movie set! Item arrived quickly and I was pleasantly surprised to see that all three discs each had their own separate locking station to keep them all separated from touching each other - some of these "sets" merely stack the discs on top of each other which is not a good thing at all. Death Wish I already had, but while I bought this set primarily for the Clint Eastwood film "Escape From Alcatraz", the 3-disc set was actually cheaper than buying the single movie so I made out there! Well worth the purchase price, in my opinion!!
